questions.quote: Ah - see the sense of humor? C'mere, I'm so nuts about you... I tell ya, it was fun being single, but when you meet a woman like this, you don't walk to get married - you run!
Well, George, I just want you to hear me say to Anna that you're a good and decent person.
Is that so? Or could it be that you're just a *little* bit worried that you may have missed the boat?
Well, I was going to watch it with my daughter. She likes Audrey Hepburn very much.
Prediction. I never see you or him again for the rest of my life.
Well I, uh, I'm not sure how you pronounce it or anything, but I, uh, I believe it's Ménage à Trois?
I see, well, that's open to interpretation. Because so much depends on the layering and the quality of the wetness in the eyes.
It was destroyed. But out of that, a new holiday was born. "A Festivus for the rest of us!"
No. A $29,000 piece of cake. Peterman got it at The Duke Of Windsor auction. It was the most romantic thing I've ever eaten.
Why does everything have to be 'us'? Is there no 'me' left? Why can't there be some things just for me? Is that so selfish?
